Index Ventures

Index Ventures is a global venture capital firm partnering with ambitious entrepreneurs from seed stage to IPO. They focus on building real relationships with founders across various industries. Their investment philosophy emphasizes backing visionaries and game-changers.

Offices: San Francisco (United States), New York (United States), London (United Kingdom), Geneva (Switzerland), Jersey (United Kingdom)

Investment Stages: Seed, Series A, Series B, Series C

Markets: AI/ML, Business Applications, Data, Entertainment, Fintech, Future Of Work, Healthcare, Media, Mobility, Open Source, Retail, Security, Talent

Founded Year: 1996

Investor Type: Venture Capital
